meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.11 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.11 has just been released.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x and Log4j 2 CVE-2021-44228
meta.summary: A recent CVE-2021-44228 has been disclosed that affects the Log4j 2 library. The Vert.x project can optionally use Log4j but does not ship it and therefore is not affected by this CVE.

meta.title: Things to keep in mind concerning CSRF attacks
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x like most frameworks provides an anti-CSRF defense. However, no framework can prevent all attack vectors that exist in the web. Therefore, developers need to be aware of some dangers and common attack vectors concerning CSRF defenses.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 CR1 released!
meta.summary: The first release candidate of the upcoming Vert.x 4 has just been released. We consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: Building services and APIs with AMQP 1.0
meta.summary: Microservices and APIs are everywhere. Everyone talks about them, presentation slides are full of them ... some people are actually even building them.
